text: Va cun onhoro az coniʙi Alloh kitoʙi Qur'on omad, ki tasdiqkunandai kitoʙi onon (Tavrot) ʙud, onro inkor kardand va pajomʙarii Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam)-ro niz inkor kardand. Va hol on ki onho pes az in ʙar musrikoni araʙ piruzi metalaʙidand va meguftand: Bi'sati pajomʙari oxiri zamon nazdik omad va mo pajravi u suda, hamrohi u ʙo sumo mecangem. Vaqte ki pajomʙar omad, uro sinoxtand, sifot va sidqi uro donistand, uro munkir sudand. Pas la'nati Alloh ʙar har kase, ki ʙa Pajomʙari oxiri zamon Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) kufr meorad va kitoʙasro tasdiq namekunad
